correctness.rationale: Several core fields are correct and traceable (PEALD for InOx/GaOx/ZnOx; precursors DADI/TMGa/DEZ; O2 plasma co‑reactant; 250 °C temperature; plasma power 38 W; 1:1:1 supercycle ratio; uniformity 1.26%; device Vth ≈ −3.5 V and SS ≈ 230 mV/dec; tool TFS200). However, there are multiple schema violations, incorrect values, and untraceable entries: (1) Schema violations with nulls: many required numeric fields are set to None (pressure.quantityValue.numericValue; thicknessControl.growthPerCycle.numberofCycles.numericValue; thicknessControl.filmThickness.numericValue; nucleationPeriod.numericValue; all dosingTime/purgeTime numeric values; all flowRates numeric values; conformality.aspectRatio.numericValue; several material/device property values). The schema requires numbers, not nulls. (2) Carrier/purging gases are given as the literal string “Not Found,” which is untraceable and violates the no-empty/placeholder expectation for required fields. (3) GPC unit/value error: the article reports ~0.21 nm/cycle, but the extraction records 0.21 Å (a 10× underestimation). (4) GPC per compound (InOx, GaOx, ZnOx) is not supported; the paper reports an overall IGZO growth rate versus supercycle number, not per-oxide GPC. (5) Film composition atomicRatio “1:1:1” is presented as measured; in the article this is a cycle ratio used in deposition, not a measured elemental ratio—thus not traceable as a composition result. (6) Substrate set to “SiO2/Si” is not explicitly stated; IGZO was deposited on a vertical MIM structure and an 8‑inch wafer (type not specified). (7) Crystallinity “amorphous,” saturation=True, filmStability=True, and reproducibility=True are not substantiated by the text. (8) Duplicate/ambiguous filmThickness entries (inside growthPerCycle and at thicknessControl level) with null values. Correct or remove unsubstantiated entries, provide actual numeric values (or omit non-required fields), fix the GPC unit/value, and supply traceable carrier/purge gases to meet schema and article alignment.

completeness.rationale: The extraction has multiple schema violations and missing or non-traceable values. Required numeric fields are left as None (invalid per schema) for several processParameters: pressure, nucleationPeriod, dosingTime (precursor/co-reactant for all compounds), purgeTime, flowRates, and filmThickness. In thicknessControl, numberofCycles and filmThickness also have None values. MaterialProperties contains required objects with missing numeric data: conformality.aspectRatio (None), filmComposition.elementalConcentration.values (None), roughness.value (None), and filmDensity.value (None); characterization methods are largely absent. The growth-per-cycle is incorrectly reported as 0.21 Å, while the article states ~0.21 nm/cycle (should be 2.1 Å). Several fields use placeholders not supported by the article (carrierGas and purgingGas set to 'Not Found'; saturation set to True without evidence; otherAspects.filmStability and reproducibility set to True without support). The substrate is given as 'SiO2/Si' without explicit grounding in the text. The atomicRatio '1:1:1' appears to reflect cycle ratio, not a measured composition, and lacks a characterization method. Although PEALD of Al2O3 and IZO are also reported in the article, only the IGZO process is extracted; if the scope is the full BEOL PEALD flow, additional processes should be added. To be complete and schema-compliant, supply grounded values (or omit optional fields) and correct units: provide reactor pressure, dosing/purge times, flow rates, number of cycles or film thickness, conformality aspect ratio, measured composition (or remove), crystallinity method, roughness and density metrics, and correct GPC (0.21 nm or 2.1 Å).
